title: Pixel 4 Bluetooth connection issues after the June 5, 2020 update
content: Bluetooth connectivity between my Pixel 4 and my 2015 Mercedes Benz ML350 became very unreliable after the June 5, 2020 Android  update.  Before that date there was rarely a problem connecting. Now, it connects maybe one time out of ten.  Often, it connects right away, shows 5 bars of signal strength, then immediately displays "No Service". The phone service provider is Google Project Fi and I am in a metropolitan area.
